Uses of Interface
com.composum.pages.commons.request.RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AspectFactory

  • Packages that use RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AspectFactory 
    Package Description
    com.composum.pages.commons.request  

    • Uses of RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AspectFactory in com.composum.pages.commons.request

      Classes in com.composum.pages.commons.request that implement RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AspectFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected class  RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AccessModeFactory
      this factory is adapting to the instance controlled by the platform access manager only - the name of the enum value is stored in request / session
      protected class  RequestAspectAdapterFactory.DisplayModeFactory
      the display mode is a stack object stored in the request and modified during request rendering - the session does not store this aspect - he PagesFrameServlet is storing another value of the same type and key in the session for the frames display mode
      protected class  RequestAspectAdapterFactory.PagesLocaleFactory
      the locale is stored if specified as is in the request and also in the session for further requests
      Fields in com.composum.pages.commons.request with type parameters of type RequestAspectAdapterFactory.AspectFactory 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
